Searching.description:
Happy New Year everyone!! To kick 2015 off with a bang we decided to finally release our ZHU - Faded remix with @Moiez-babar as a free download!! We want to thank everyone who supported our previous remix of @Goldroom - "Till Sunrise" which peaked at #2 on Hype Machine last week! So unexpected but amazing to see people appreciating some of our experimental stuff. We feel Faded is the precursor to "Till Sunrise" as far as the events of a night unfolding, from that late night phone call until sunrise the next morning. We went for a similar uplifting euphoric feeling but with a bit more energy on this one. We loved the original Faded which was very sexy and dark but with this one we wanted to capture a slightly different perspective on that late night phone call and give the song a whole new life. Hope you guys enjoy this tune and stay tuned for the next one coming soon =)

P.S. We are heavily contemplating releasing an instrumental version with a slightly different breakdown and new melody break. If you guys think its a good idea please leave us a comment =)

cover: that late night moment after the party when you are in the cab, faded, looking out the rain drop covered window, blurred city lights pass you by as you contemplate making that call….
